name: The backrooms (itch) (JordyWolf)
description:
The backrooms is a research and development school project about procedural content generation.

The game is just a prototype showing off an infinitely generating enviroment in the style of the backrooms. There is no goal in the game, as it is just a prototype to show the technology and algorithms used.

Read about the development process here: https://summit-2223-sem2.game-lab.nl/2023/04/11/procedural-environment-the-backr...

To play, extract the ZIP and run the .EXE inside.
